message: Finishing my new web shop - http://muzarena.com.ua. What do you think about the deisgn and website? It is partially based on theme from themeforest but completely reworked and redesigned.
Looks good. I'm more worked about your choice of framework. I've worked with spree and had a horrible time. Hopefully, you're not customizing it too much
Actually, I cutomize it, and keep customizing it more & more. It is looks like in few monthes it will not bee spree because I'm rewriting it class by class.
